Key Match Events: Shaheen Shah Afridi bowled a stunner to dismiss Tim Robinson
Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan named Babar Azam as the white-ball captain for Pakistan after Shaheen Shah Afridi was removed from the captaincy
Pakistan included Mohammad Aamir in playing for the first match after he decided to step down from retirement
Tim Robinson made his debut for New Zealand in the first encounter
Miscellaneous Highlights: The first T20I match between New Zealand and Pakistan at Rawalpindi Cricket Stadium, Rawalpindi ended in a no-result due to consistent rains
Others: The match did not start due to persistent rains. After a long rain delay break, the rain stopped and it was reduced to 5 overs game
Both teams would look to make use of matches ahead of the T20 World Cup 2024 to be played in the West Indies and the USA
Pakistan will play T20I matches against England and Ireland before the T20 World Cup
